Suggest reframing this page as a way to prevent accessibility issues or cut down on them out of the gate. Talk about native element semantics and how they map to browser accessibility APIs, doing a lot of the hard work for you. Mention first rule of ARIA. Mention HTML Validator as first line of defence against accessibility errors.
